channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora's family makes a pinata for Mami that flies away in 'A Pinata For Mami', then in 'Invisi-Swiper', Swiper swipes an invisibility blanket. (S2, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington must keep his promise to not make a mess in 'Paddington's Goo Monster', then in 'Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure', Paddington and Simi go on a journey into the human body. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: America; The Diner: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Canyon Country; Hollywood: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Motorbiking; Sea Treasure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Monkey Has A Cough; Police Car: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Cows: The children are at the Elf Farm, but to learn where milk comes from they must visit a big farm, to find cows. They travel to Lucy Big's farm, where she shows them all the animals.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Windmill: King Thistle wants bread for his royal breakfast, but there isn't any flour in the castle. Mr Elf takes everyone to the Elf Windmill to find out why it takes so long to make flour.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: No Magic Day: For an entire day the Kingdom has to make do without help from magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Wand Factory: Holly breaks her wand and must go to the Wand Factory, at the bottom of the Great Elf Tree, to get it fixed.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Windsor Gardens has two new heroes in 'Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant', then in 'Paddington and the Accidental Hero', Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome. (S3, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Mysterious lights are messing up the dancing at the firefly prom in 'The Unidentified Shiny Object', and in 'The Case of the Crying Monkey', the duo follows sounds to locate a baby monkey. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Snow, Sea, Sky, Race: Blaze and Crusher face off in an off-road showdown. The trucks must speed through the snow, swim through the sea, and soar to a finish line in the sky! (S8, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: CatRat's Puzzle Hunt: The Gabby Cats have set up a puzzle hunt in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy solve riddles, look for clues and complete puzzle challenges. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Gargamel meets his nephews Dwayne and Rowena in 'Family Time', then in 'Smurf vs Machine', Handy is jealous of DD. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: It's Smurfies versus Gargamel in 'See Gargamel Run', then in 'Hefty Baby', Baby Smurf gets stronger. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Something's gone wrong on the swamp tour in 'Pups Save a Swamp Creature', then in 'Pups and the Hidden Golden Bones', everything is shaking and breaking beneath Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Digi and Tal's inventions go haywire in 'Pups Save a Runaway Robo-Chicken Purse', then in 'Pups Save the Buggy Trekkers', Humdinger squeezes himself into the dune buggy race. (S10, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots gets Tico a Guayabera shirt in 'A Guayabera For Tico', then in 'Falling Estrella's', Dora returns three missing stars to their constellation. (S1, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Hamster Kitties: When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hop, Skip and Jump!; Rescuing Miss Rabbit!: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Diary; Playing Golf: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Journey to the Centre of the Earth: Naughty Daisy and Poppy magic their teacher, Mrs Fotheringill to the centre of the Earth, so Granpapa Thistle leads Ben and Holly on a rescue mission.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Sleepover: Holly shrinks Lucy and her dog, Rex, down so they can play in the Little Kingdom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Playgroup: After the disappearance of Mrs Fotheringill, Mrs Elf becomes the twins' new teacher.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston's Birthday: It's King Thistle's birthday, but he does not want a birthday party. But Gaston the ladybird has never had a birthday party, so King Thistle says it can be Gaston's birthday party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef surprises Olly for her birthday in 'Donuts', then in 'Rainbow Salad', Chef babysits Jessica's ladybug babies. (S2, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin in 'Pups Save A Teeny Tiny Penguin', then in 'Pups Save the Cat Show', Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running wild.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan: Peppa and her family are on a caravan adventure and the first stop is The Biggest Potato in the World. When it starts to get foggy, they park up before another busy day. (S7, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends: After Peppa and family visit a tourist spot with her new friend Birgit Bear, the caravan unhooks from the car! Luckily, the bear family stop it just in time. (S7, ep 26).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Singing Lesson; Singing Competition: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston Goes To School: Naughty Gaston is sent to pet school, where Miss Jolly soon gets him into shape.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Picnic: Holly invites Ben on the annual Royal Fairy Picnic. King Thistle hopes there won't be a repeat of last year's magical jelly flood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Ant Farm: Things are going missing all over the Little Kingdom - Holly has lost her wand and Ben has lost his horn! Soon they realise that ants are stealing their things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Elf Rescue: With so many rescue missions, Elf Rescue needs a helping hand from Children Rescue.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wendy Wolf's Birthday: Wendy Wolf's birthday is here and she has invited Peppa and friends around for a party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George's Wooly Hat: George has a new hat and Mummy Pig is determined that George doesn't get it muddy when visiting Grandpa and Granny Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Canal Boat: It's Captain Daddy Dog's birthday and Mummy Dog surprises him with the gift of a boat trip, which isn't quite what he had expected.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig's Greenhouse: Grandpa Pig and Grandpa Dog are showing and sharing their lovely, tomato filled, Greenhouses to Peppa and George.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes; Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses: Eight episodes.

channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns go to the beach in 'Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins', then in 'Paddington's Life Guard Training', Paddington, Jonathan and Judy rescue Mr Brown with lifeguard Taylor's help. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery', and in 'Paddington and the Fossil Hunt', Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but isn't having any luck. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips in 'Paddington vs the Seagulls', and in 'Paddington and the Light House', the lighthouse light is broken - can Paddington help save a boat at sea? (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition! (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile: When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.desc: True Fairy Friends: A Fairy Fly is coming to stay in the Fairy Tail Garden! But before they arrive, the Gabby Cats have to show they are true friends by being kind, helpful and welcoming. (S3, ep 8).

channel.desc: Mr Cat's Cafe; Cushion Den: Two episodes.

channel.desc: A fire breaks out in 'Pups Save A Baby Goat Birthday', then in 'Pups Save A S'more-Mergency', Humdinger goes camping, and has just one thing on his mind. (S11, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save Lizzy's Lemonade Blaze:Mayor Humdinger and his kitties accidentally set Lizzy's Lemonade Stand and parts of Foggy Bottom ablaze. It's up to the pups to extinguish the fires! (S11, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Tyre Trouble: Blaze and his pals are gearing up for a big race with brand new tyres! But Crusher tricks Starla, Darington and Stripes into putting on out-of-control silly tyres! (S8, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Rubble & Crew helps Aaron Judge hit 100 home runs in 'The Crew Builds A Ballpark', then in 'The Crew Builds A Surf Bridge', the pups learn how to surf! (S2, ep 12).

channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: There's a game of hide-and-seek in the wetlands in 'The Lost Capybara Kids', then in 'The Case of the Curious Keas', Sam and Kit try to figure out who's playing tricks on them in the snow. (S1, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale
channel.desc: The hamsters mistake a party for an invasion in 'The Dragon Egg of Surprise', then in 'Cave of Coldness', Mondo goes into the A/C vents on a rescue mission. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing in 'The Rainforest Ritmo', then in 'The Magic Nut', Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space. (S3, ep 2).

channel.desc: Mrs Fig's Magic School: Despite protests from the Wise Old Elf, Ben accompanies Holly to her first day at magic school.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Tooth Fairy: Ben and Holly are excited when they learn that Nanny Plum is a Tooth Fairy at night, and go along with her to pick up a little girl's tooth. But the little girl is not so little.

channel.desc: Miss Jolly's Riding Club: Ben, Holly and their friends go on a snail trek with Miss Jolly.

channel.desc: Judy finds her inner hero on a camping trip in 'Paddington's Race Against the Storm', then in 'Paddington's Super Snail', Paddington befriends a speedy snail with a heroic future ahead. (S3, ep 15).

channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Scaredy discovers the forest in 'The Tour', and then in 'Smurfing a Masterpiece', Baby Smurf is the new Painter! (S3, ep 9).

channel.desc: Lily and Farmer have to save the village from a slobbering monster in 'Monster in the Village', then in 'Granny's Doll', Rowena is turned into Smurfette and takes her place in the village. (S3, ep 10).

channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rocky goes missing at Uncle Otis's cabin in 'Pups and the Werepuppy!', then in 'Pups Save a Sleepwalking Mayor', It's Cowboy Day, and Mayor Goodway faces the hazards of the ranch while sleepwalking.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs in 'Pups Save the Runaway Turtles', then in 'Pups Save the Shivering Sheep', Farmer Al's sheep run away, and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the twins see the rainbow in 'Rainbow's Lost Colours', then in 'Boots' Rubber Band Ball', Boots has to retrieve his ball after it lands in Cynthia the Centipede's yard. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Let's Make a Movie!: When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it's movie night in the dollhouse! (S1, ep 14).
